reapack.name: RA-DOUBLAGE_COUNT_ITEMS_on_selected_track.lua
reapack.desc: Couts the number of items on selected track.

reapack.name: RA-DOUBLAGE_COUNT_ITEMS_on_selected_track_within_time_selection.lua
reapack.desc: Couts the number of items on selected track, within time selection.

reapack.name: RA-DOUBLAGE_Mute_WAV_track_&_UNMUTE_DUB+EDITED.lua
reapack.desc: MUTE WAV Track and UNMUTE DUB + EDITED

reapack.name: RA-DOUBLAGE_Unmute_WAV_track_&_MUTE_DUB+EDITED.lua
reapack.desc: Unmute WAV track and MUTE DUB + EDITED

reapack.name: RA-Keep Selected Items with 1ch only.lua
reapack.desc: Keep Selected Items with only 1 channel

version.author: MrBrock adapted from X-raym with AI. Original script prompted for user imput.

reapack.name: RA-Keep_selected_items_looped_longer_than_source.lua
reapack.desc: This script will check for looped items and keep selected those that go beyond source lenght.

reapack.name: RA-Move selected items to first selected track within overlap threshold.lua
reapack.desc: Move selected items to first selected track within overlap threshold.

reapack.name: RA-Reduce_Take_Gain_by_a_Quarter.lua
reapack.desc: This script will check the value for take gain and reduce it by 25%.

reapack.name: RA-Rename Items based on Parent Source File Name.lua
reapack.desc: This script renames the active take of an audio item based on the file name of the source file. It works with sections or reversed sources.

version.author: Frankfante assembled with original scripts by Thonex, nofish and spk77

reapack.name: RA-Rename Items based on Source File Name.lua
reapack.desc: This script renames the active take of an audio item based on the file name of the source file.

reapack.name: RA-Swap item volume and take volume.lua
reapack.desc: Swap the item gain with take gain.

reapack.name: RA-Unselect_Muted_Items.lua
reapack.desc: Unselects muted items within previous selection of items
